lead_paragraph: In an effort to court the most highly rated free agent pitcher on the market, members of the Mets’ front office planned to depart for Los Angeles for a face-to-face encounter with Barry Zito.
snippet: In an effort to court the most highly rated free agent pitcher on the market, members of the Mets’ front office planned to depart for Los Angeles for a face-to-face encounter with Barry Zito.
